correct_order: Add some generous helpings of debt, a few spoonful of management incentives and trim all the fat.
Leave to cook for five years and you have a feast of profits.
That has been the recipe for private-equity groups during the past 20 years.

sources: Add some generous helpings of debt, a few spoonful of management incentives and trim all the fat.
That has been the recipe for private-equity groups during the past 20 years.
Leave to cook for five years and you have a feast of profits.
